name: zodiac
description: 12 card Zodiac spread: 1 for each astrological house

semantic_groups.ari: Aries: Mars (Planet), Fire (Element), New Beginnings/Initiation/Self-expression/Method of Action
semantic_groups.tau: Taurus: Venus (Planet), Earth (Element), Material Concerns/Required Resources/Seeds to Sow for Outcome
semantic_groups.gem: Gemini: Mercury (Planet), Air (Element), Querent's Thoughts/Communications/Method for Communication or Collaboration
semantic_groups.can: Cancer: Moon (Planet), Water (Element), Emotional Security Foundation/Situational Mood/Method to Gain Emotional Ease
semantic_groups.leo: Leo: Sun (Planet), Fire (Element), Personality/Creative Expression/Public Image/Method to Build Confidence
semantic_groups.vir: Virgo: Mercury (Planet), Earth (Element), Systems for Productivity/Healthy Habits/Advice to Find Practical Solutions
semantic_groups.lib: Libra: Venus (Planet), Air (Element), Committed Partnerships/Personal Balance/Advice to Solve Conflicts
semantic_groups.sco: Scorpio: Pluto (Planet), Water (Element), Personal Power/Sexuality/Long-term Investments and Wealth
semantic_groups.sag: Sagittarius: Jupiter (Planet), Fire (Element), Adventure/Travel/Personal Growth/Study and Teaching
semantic_groups.cap: Capricorn: Saturn (Planet), Earth (Element), Ambition/Discipline/Career Success/Professional Focus
semantic_groups.aqu: Aquarius: Uranus (Planet), Air (Element), Originality/Creativity/Ability to Innovate/Community Affiliation
semantic_groups.pis: Pisces: Neptune (Planet), Water (Element), Dreams/Fantasies/Spiritual Wisdom/Transitions/What to Release

guidance: Mars as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of courage and competitive spirit
Venus as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of beauty and pleasure
Mercury as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of inquisitiveness and communicativeness
The Moon as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of flowing feelings
The Sun as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of boldness and ego-driven tendencies
Pluto as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of intensity and powerfulness
Jupiter as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of joviality and larger-than-life stature
Saturn as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of seriousness and hard-working demeanor
Uranus as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of rebelliousness and uniqueness
Neptune as Planetary Ruler represents aspects of imaginativeness and dreaminess
Earth Element represents grounding in physical reality
Air Element represents animating spirit that gets things moving
Fire Element represents change, especially from action
Reversals do not mean inversion but instead require orthogonal analysis -- different, but not opposite
